actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to permit citizens of the United States to acquire, hold, and dispose of gold notwithstanding the provisions of any other law.

summary.text: Permits citizens of the United States to acquire, hold, and dispose of gold notwithstanding the provisions of the Gold Reserve Act or any other law.

titles.title: A bill to permit citizens of the United States to acquire, hold, and dispose of gold notwithstanding the provisions of any other law.
